displayProperties.description: A reawakening stirs deep within you and radiates outward.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Robes (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Show them! You are here, awake at last!
displayProperties.name: Solstice Bond (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: The flame of reawakening ignites in your mind.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Hood (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description: Run! For you are awake now and may never sleep again!
displayProperties.name: Solstice Boots (Rekindled)

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians to celebrate Solstice.

Contains the exclusive Memorium Sol Sparrow, exclusive Thunderwing jumpship, and 10 Solstice shaders.
displayProperties.name: Celebration Vehicle Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who exemplify elegance amidst brutality.

Contains the Gray Nitrite ornament, three Solstice Engrams, and one Gleaming Boon of the Crucible.
displayProperties.name: Function Given Form Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know that the best gifts are those given to others.

Contains one Solstice Engram, one Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard, one Gleaming Boon of the Crucible, and one Fireteam Medallion.
displayProperties.name: Generosity Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians to get into the celebratory spirit.

Contains the Teamwork Dance emote, three Solstice Engrams, and one Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard.
displayProperties.name: Dance Party Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time-purchase bundle containing the exclusive weapon ornament, Bound Hammer, for the Exotic Sniper Rifle, Whisper of the Worm.

Contains a weapon ornament, a transmat effect, and Bright Dust.
displayProperties.name: Bound Hammer Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time-purchase bundle containing the exclusive weapon ornament, Between Breaths, for the Exotic Sniper Rifle, Whisper of the Worm.

Contains a weapon ornament, a transmat effect, and Bright Dust.
displayProperties.name: Between Breaths Bundle

displayProperties.name: Destabilizers

displayProperties.description: Throwing Knife final blows decrease the cooldown of your Super. Hits and final blows with Blade Barrage will return Super energy after the Super ends.
displayProperties.name: Sharp Edges

displayProperties.description: Bow charges can be held indefinitely. Gain a bonus to the Bow's damage when released, based on how long the charge was held. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Bows.
displayProperties.name: Adamantine Brace

displayProperties.description: Gain a second dodge charge. Shortly after dodging, your next weapon final blow spawns an Orb of Power.
displayProperties.name: Double Dodge

displayProperties.description: Each Spectral Blades kill you make before going into stealth will restore more of your Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Roving Assassin

displayProperties.description: Move faster while guarding with Sentinel Shield or the Unbreakable shield. Damage blocked with either is converted to Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Ursine Guard

displayProperties.description: Highlights the target who dares to damage you. Track down and destroy them for an overshield.
displayProperties.name: Vengeance

displayProperties.description: Using an ability (grenade, melee, or Barricade) empowers the other two abilities. Empowered means abilities have faster regen, melees and grenades do more damage, and Barricades have more hit points.
displayProperties.name: Overflowing Light

displayProperties.description: While sliding with full class ability energy, you gain a frontal shield that reflects incoming damage. After reflecting damage, your class ability energy is depleted based on the amount of damage reflected.
displayProperties.name: Reflective Vents

displayProperties.description: Resist incoming damage while charging your Void grenade with Chaos Accelerant. Charged Void grenades return grenade energy on a hit.
displayProperties.name: Chaotic Exchanger

displayProperties.description:
Precision final blows from Kinetic weapons create an explosion in the element of your equipped Super and apply a matching elemental effect:
• [Arc] Blinds targets.
• [Solar] Scorches targets.
• [Void] Weakens targets.
• [Stasis] Slows targets.
• [Strand] Severs targets.
displayProperties.name: Crystalline Transistor

displayProperties.description: Kills and assists you make while standing in your Well of Radiance return Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Battle-Hearth

displayProperties.description: Damaging targets with Chaos Reach extends its duration. Collecting ionic traces grants you energy for Chaos Reach.
displayProperties.name: Close Enough
